EmailTemplate.subject: Log in - Parent Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The School Hub Support Request
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We are sorry to bother you, but we wanted to follow up as our system shows you have not logged in to the school's parent portal. A login email was sent last Friday.
We wanted to make sure you (a) received the email (b) had no problem login in.
If you can't locate the email, please check your "Spam folder" or there is a chance your partner parent has received instead.
Please feel free to contact us by replying to this email (support@britishschools.co.uk) and we will be happy to re-send the login email, adjust any contact details or help out with any other issues you might have.
Regards
School Hub Support Team World Class Education
